categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine

Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine was a children's magazine published by Titan Magazines to accompany the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It ran for twenty-two issues, from October 5, 2010 to January 21, 2014.
After the twenty-second issue, the magazine was revamped as the Star Wars Magazine, which grew to incorporate material from the Star Wars films.
